Configuration.Name: L1=L2=4_central_apx5_VS_Mag
Configuration.SetupScript: sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/setspeed 28300') sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength 5') config.wavelength_spread = 0.14 #config.wavelength = 5 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 #config.wavelength_spread = 0.064 config.det = 3200 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g7' config.apx = -23 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 90.17 config.beamcenterz = 96.10 config.drive()
